column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////when i first moved here
column2: folks told me i 'had' to eat here.   well
column3: i ate there twice and each time afterward
column4: it felt like my lower GI was going to explode.  i don't know if it's the combination of grease
column5: sangria and the little ham weiner thingies
column6: but this place makes me turn green.  somehow
column7: i don't really think spanish tapas are supposed to taste like this.
